Text: Well thx for that but i don't think i'll ever play morrowind again. I played 4 times, doing absolutley everything everytime.Every quests, dozens of mods, but i do reccomend it for everyone, great game; not like this bullshit of a game Oblivion, YEACK :P

Oh, and if you want to know specifically what mods I included:

Alternate Enchanted Icons
Authentic Signs
Barabus's Fireplaces
Better Deadric
Better Sky
Bookjackets MW 1,2 and 3
Bookjackets Tribunal
Bottle Replacer
Changing Faces NPC replacer
Clear Glass Equipment
Ebony Weapons Enhancer
Illuminated Windows
K Weather (not really a graphics mod, this one just allows you to hear the weather outside when in a house - it's an atmosphere thing)
MW Visual Pack 2.2 (nature)
Lantern Replacer
Loch Master Head Pack
Meteors (really cool, you can see meteors streaking through the night sky occasionally)
Misc Items Replacer
More Trees and Foliage
More Trees and Foliage (new textures)
MW Visual Pack 2.11
Reflective Gold
Sharpened Armor Models
Sharpened Weapons Models
Silverware Enhancer 
New Tapestries
Beaded Curtains
Bed Replacer
The Lighting Mod - Modular (REALLY cool, adds very realistic lighting to the game)
Unique Banners and Signs
MW Visual Pack XT
Weathered Signs
Windows Glow
World of Faces
Better Bodies 2.2

None of these affect gameplay in anyway.
I'm seeding it right now, and should be all day
like dude giv uzz sum screens man

I though about making some screenshots, but these mods change so many things I'd be here all day taking screens. These are the best of the best though, and maybe when a few people finish downloading and installing them, their coments here will make you want to give it a go.
